title: Windows 10 5in1 10240 x32 en-US Oct2015
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 10 5in1 x32 10240 en-US

No Windows 10 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Unattended Settings were added to the installation.
No Registry Settings were modified.

32-bit Source:
10240.16393.150909-1450.th1_refresh_clientsinglelanguage_ret_x86fre_en-us_36b7acccfcf74e21d1304cfa8954f5fe97727d79.esd

Installation Indexes:
Windows 10 Home Single Language
Windows 10 Home
Windows 10 Pro
Windows 10 Education
Windows 10 Enterprise

Release File: Win10_10240_x32_Oct2015_5in1_en-US_murphy78.iso
Size: 3.01 GB
SHA-1: 37F2F3BF65D8B3022F930FA00D71F44A4798A857

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
dism for Windows Updates integration and mounted file copy
oscdimg for ISO mastering
Microsoft DaRT 10
murphy78 diskpart script v1.2.8
Added Info folder to Setup dir to annoy credit thieves.

Pre-integrated updates in source image (boot.wim and winre.wim):
KB3081452, KB3081455

DISM /add-package and /resetbase (Indexes):
KB3074678, KB3074686, KB3081449, KB3093266, KB3097617, KB3099406


Features:
-MS DaRT 10 added to recovery options on both boot and winre
-Some useful scripts added to iso.
-DiskPart setup script v1.2.8 - Just boot to setup media
and press shift-f10 to bring up console and then type "Menu"
-UEFI support for 32-bit processors

Instructions:
-Use a USB program such as RUFUS to put this on a USB
Flash drive for boot installs.
-Alternatively, if you still use physical media, you can
burn the iso to a dvdr or greater.

Privacy Notes:
-Use the Customize option during OOBE account setup phase
-Uncheck the stuff that sends data to MS if you value privacy
-Run both telemetry scripts in the scripts folder
-Either disable Windows Defender completely or go into
settings->update->Defender and disable cloud and sample submit
-Running any Windows App (store type apps) will send data to ms
-I have included a script to turn the search box into a
computer-only search (no internet search)
-Between telemetry scripts, defender options, and search box,
most or all of the spying stuff is blocked.
-I am unsure about the error reporting as I haven't seen it
actually send any data in my sniffing, but if you are paranoid
you can feel free to disable it in settings->Privacy

Pro-Tip:
-To stop the system from automatically downloading drivers the
first time, you need to run setup with internet disabled and
then run the driver automatic download enable/disable script.

Change Notes:
-LTSB removed. I know. I don't like removing it either, but
there is no updated source image for LTSB version. It would
make the iso about a gig larger to include it.
-Upgrade files have been re-added to iso. I could explain but
it would take up too much room. The tradeoff is that netfx3 is
not integrated by default and will re-download the missing lang
components if you install it when you run update check next time

Credits:
CODYQX4 - Microsoft Toolkit KMS Activator
murphy78 - Integration, ISO design, Script and testing

Enjoy,
murphy78 :)
